name: Sun House Block Print - Limited Edition of 35
description: I've become a little fascinated with the geometry of European folk art and mid century pattern design lately. There is something so perfect about their deceptive simplicity and it struck me that the latter was very much informed by the former. Here is my first attempt to wed stylistic the motifs of these two fields. I carved this print into linoleum and printed it on high quality, acid-free paper with water-based ink. This is a limited edition print of 35. Measures approximately 21 cm by 30 cm. Shipped with sturdy backer board in a protective sleeve. Does not include frame or matting. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.

name: Darwin Block Print - Limited Edition of 35
description: Perhaps I'm running my geek flag up the proverbial flag-pole to admit I have a favourite scientist, but in my opinion Charles Darwin is the bomb! It is hard to over estimate how much his ideas have influenced our perception of the modern world. Besides, anyone who spends that much time thinking about simians is alright in my book. So here is my little tribute to Chuck D. Printed from a wood-cut on high quality, acid-free paper, this print is a limited edition run of 35. Measures approximately 16 cm by 24 cm. Shipped with sturdy backer board in a protective sleeve. Does not include frame or matting. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.

name: Sol Block Print - Limited Edition of 35
description: Replicated from a detail of a 16th woodcut by Olaus Magnus, this intriguing image was cut into linoleum and printed on high quality, acid-free paper with water-based ink. This is a limited edition print run of 35 impressions. Measures approximately 16 cm by 24 cm. Shipped with sturdy backer board in a protective sleeve. Does not include frame or matting. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.

name: Frozen Sea Block Print - Limited Edition of 35
description: What can beat a good book? Here is my favourite quote by one of my favourite authors. This linoleum block print of a quote by Franz Kafka is limited edition of 35. Measures approximately 21 cm by 12 cm. Printed on high quality paper with water based ink. Shipped with sturdy backer board in a protective sleeve. Does not include frame or matting. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.

name: Sol Tote
description: Replicated from a detail of a 16th woodcut by Olaus Magnus, the intriguing image for this tote was cut into linoleum, printed and then transferred to a silkscreen. Printed on a heavy, 100% cotton canvas tote bag made by AS Colour. Sweatshop free and Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP) certified. Find out more about WRAP here. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.

name: Darwin T-Shirt
description: Perhaps I'm running my geek flag up the proverbial flag-pole to admit I have a favourite scientist, but in my opinion Charles Darwin is the bomb! It is hard to over estimate how much his ideas influenced our perception of the modern world. Besides, anyone who spends that much time thinking about simians is alright in my book. So here is my little tribute to Chuck D. Men's cotton T-shirt with one-colour silk screened image of Charles Darwin. Image reproduced from an original woodcut print. Printed white ink on a high quality AS Colour T-Shirt. Available in Asphalt Marle, Navy Marle or Steel Marle. I will be adding extra sizes as the shop grows. If you don't see your size but would like a t-shirt please let me know and I will do my best to accommodate you. AS Colour Tees are sweatshop free and Worldwide Responsible Accredited Production (WRAP) certified. Find out more about WRAP here. -------------------------------------------------- Please read our shipping & policies page for information shipping times, refunds or other questions you might have.
